title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 203: Featuring Roman Josi
description:
On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by the Captain of the Nashville Predators, Roman Josi. Roman joins to discuss what it's like playing in Smashville, Swiss Hockey, wedding stories and more. The boys then do their Central Division preview, breaking down each team and what they expect from them this upcoming season. The fellas wrap up with some funny stories and the topic of calling Auston Matthews “Pablo”.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
